column4: hey, the nvidia drivers on my computer seem to be broken. ive gone through every tutorial, installed nvidia-glx, changed my xorg.conf file, and when i load it up...the screen stays black and doesn't load. has anyone heard of the black screen problem?
pastebin your Xorg.0.log file it's in /var/log
the error i was getting was "failed to load nvidia kernel module"
ah ok try sudo modprobe nvidia see if that helps
